ai-atk-abh03a60:1_0: Refuses causes and conditions to arise because of his skillful teaching.
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_1: And here is there the cause, what is the reason why, together with the skillful, for all conditions, for the sake of all skillful things, for the sake of which they stop when they have made a horn of all phenomena.
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_2: And they don’t definitely divide into the skillful because of the skillful teaching.
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_3: and they don’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_0: It’s soaked by the carpents of these twenty years old together with the affliction of shoes, grain, silver, and gold.
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_2: In this way he grabs it by a hundred women, while the works and put it on dry land far from the throats, and bowlful:
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_3: They too shouldn’t give the full ordination in brief, the previous discourses.
ai-atk-abh03a60:3_0: by his former deeds and their kin.
